name: doppler-share-secrets
title: Doppler Share Secrets
description: Share sensitive data (a "secret") and View Projects with their Configs, Environments, Secrets
author: thomas

commands.name: index
commands.title: Share Secret
commands.subtitle: Doppler
commands.description: Share sensitive data (a "secret") with friends, teammates, or strangers on the internet.

commands.name: clipboardSecret
commands.title: Share Clipboard Secret
commands.subtitle: Doppler
commands.description: Share clipboard sensitive data (a "secret") with friends, teammates, or strangers on the internet.

commands.name: search-projects
commands.title: Search Projects
commands.subtitle: Doppler
commands.description: View Projects with their Configs, Environments and Secrets.

preferences.name: access_token
preferences.title: Access Token
preferences.description: Personal token from Doppler Workplace settings

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
